stuart.name: Stuart
stuart.description: A mid-forties man with short brown hair, green eyes, and an athletic build. He has a charming smile that often hides his insecurities about his marriage.
stuart.personality: Introspective and thoughtful, Stuart is initially reserved but opens up as the weekend progresses. He's curious and adventurous when it comes to exploring new sexual dynamics with Kirsty.

relationships.Kirsty: Married spouse; seeking to reignite their passion

stuart.story_arc: Discovers the importance of open communication and emotional intimacy in his marriage, leading to a stronger bond with Kirsty

kirsty.name: Kirsty
kirsty.description: A confident woman in her mid-forties with long blonde hair, blue eyes, and an hourglass figure. She has a warm smile that can turn seductive at a moment's notice.
kirsty.personality: Assertive and independent, Kirsty is open to exploring new sexual experiences with Stuart but also values their emotional connection above all else.
